title: T205 Otis Crandall T Crossed bargain price
author: sb1

posts.post_title: T205 Otis Crandall T Crossed bargain price
posts.post_content: T205 Otis Crandal with the T crossed. Great looking front with strong corners but has back damage. $20 OBO delivered.
Moved to a one day auction ends Sunday night(today) at 11:59 pm.
